channel.title: Sanitation on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Sanitation on My New Hugo Site

item.title: This'll Blow You Away
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: if you’ve been reading us for a while, you might notice a common theme in the pieces we send out to you guys. Often, our strangest issues take things common (but mundane), and discover a secret history hiding under your nose. From belly buttons to bandages to veggie burgers, no subject is too mundane for us. If you use it, there’s probably a great story as to how it got there.
